private_settings.title: Clearbit API Key
private_settings.name: api_key
private_settings.description: Use the secret API key from https://dashboard.clearbit.com/api

private_settings.name: lookup_domain
private_settings.title: Attribute that defines the company domain
private_settings.description: The connector will use the value of this account attribute as domain when fetching people from Clearbit.

private_settings.title: Enrich users belonging to one of these segments
private_settings.name: enrich_user_segments
private_settings.description: Specify one or more segments for which enrichment will be performed

private_settings.title: Enrich Accounts belonging to one of these segments
private_settings.name: enrich_account_segments
private_settings.description: Specify one or more segments for which enrichment will be performed

private_settings.title: Reveal users belonging to one of these segments
private_settings.description: Specify one or more segments to filter who will be sent to Reveal. *Every anonymous user is sent if this is empty*. We never send anyone who has identifiable information
private_settings.name: reveal_segments

private_settings.title: Discovery
private_settings.name: discovery_info
private_settings.description: The Discovery API lets you search for companies that are similar to your existing customers.

private_settings.title: Attribute that defines the company domain
private_settings.name: discover_domain
private_settings.description: Use this attribute as domain when fetching people from Clearbit.

private_settings.name: discover_account_segments
private_settings.title: Discover companies similar to the ones in these segments
private_settings.description: Specify one or more segments to Define which companies are going to trigger new Discovery calls to find similar companies.

private_settings.name: discover_limit_count
private_settings.title: Maximum number of companies to fetch for each new company triggerering Discovery

private_settings.name: prospect_account_segments
private_settings.title: Prospect companies for these Account Segments
private_settings.description: Select one or more segments. When Accounts match, The Clearbit Prospector API will be called to find leads for this Account that match your targeted profiles.

private_settings.title: Minimum anonymous visitor count in account to trigger Prospection
private_settings.name: reveal_prospect_min_contacts
private_settings.description: Don't prospect unless we have at least this number of anonymous revealed visitors. A value of 0 will prospect any account in segment

private_settings.name: prospect_limit_count
private_settings.title: Maximum number of leads to fetch per company

private_settings.name: prospect_filter_info
private_settings.title: Describe Lead Search Criteria
private_settings.headerTemplate: Search by role, seniority or title to identify your ideal prospects.

private_settings.name: prospect_filter_roles
private_settings.title: Filter for a certain Role
private_settings.description: Specify a certain role or leave blank to search without restriction.

private_settings.name: prospect_filter_seniorities
private_settings.title: Filter for specific Seniority
private_settings.description: Define a specific seniority or leave blank if you don't want to restrict your search.

private_settings.name: prospect_filter_titles
private_settings.title: Search for Titles containing
private_settings.description: Restrict your search by specifying criteria for the prospect's title. If left blank, search is carried out without restriction.

private_settings.name: prospect_filter_cities
private_settings.title: Search for Cities containing
private_settings.description: Restrict your search by specifying criteria for the prospect's city. If left blank, search is carried out without restriction.

private_settings.name: prospect_filter_states
private_settings.title: Search for States containing
private_settings.description: Restrict your search by specifying criteria for the prospect's State. If left blank, search is carried out without restriction.

private_settings.name: prospect_filter_countries
private_settings.title: Search for Countries containing
private_settings.description: Restrict your search by specifying criteria for the prospect's Country. If left blank, search is carried out without restriction.
